trans-unit.source: Represents the duration of time that a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> is active.
trans-unit.target: Representa a duração do tempo em que um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Animation.Timeline" /> está ativo.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*:*seconds*[.*fractionalSeconds*]"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*objeto* *propriedade*= "[*dias*.] *horas*:*minutos*:*segundos*[.* fractionalSeconds*] "/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="[*days*.]*hours*:*minutes*"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*objeto* *propriedade*= "[*dias*.] *horas*:*minutos*"/ >

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: \- or -
trans-unit.target: \- ou -

trans-unit.source: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>
trans-unit.target: \<*object* *property*="<xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>"/>

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *days*
trans-unit.target: *Dias*

trans-unit.source: A value greater than or equal to 0 that describes the number of days spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor maior que ou igual a 0 que descreve o número de dias abarcado desta duração.

trans-unit.source: *hours*
trans-unit.target: *Horas*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 23 that represents the number of hours spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0 e 23 que representa o número de horas abarcado desta duração.

trans-unit.source: *minutes*
trans-unit.target: *Minutos*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of minutes spanned by this duration.
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0 e 59 que representa o número de minutos abarcado desta duração.

trans-unit.source: *seconds*
trans-unit.target: *seconds*

trans-unit.source: A value between 0 and 59 that represents the number of seconds spanned by this duration
trans-unit.target: Um valor entre 0 e 59 que representa o número de segundos abrangido por esta duração

trans-unit.source: *fractionalSeconds*
trans-unit.target: *fractionalSeconds*

trans-unit.source: A value consisting of 1 to 7 digits that represents fractional seconds.
trans-unit.target: Um valor consiste em 1 a 7 dígitos que representa segundos fracionários.

trans-unit.source: Represents the initial time interval of this duration.
trans-unit.target: Representa o intervalo de tempo inicial desta duração.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> structure with the supplied <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da estrutura <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> com o valor <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> fornecido.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <paramref name="timeSpan" /> is initialized to a negative value.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <paramref name="timeSpan" /> é inicializado com um valor negativo.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of the current instance plus <c>duration</c>.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que representa o valor da instância atual mais a <c>duração</c>.

trans-unit.source: Adds the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to the value of the current instance.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o valor da instância especificada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> ao valor da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the combined values.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> tiverem valores, uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que representa os valores combinados.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that is automatically determined.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que é determinado automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to an automatic value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> inicializada com um valor automático.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *propriedade*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade que aceita um <xref:System.Windows.Duration> valor.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Compares one <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value to another.
trans-unit.target: Compara um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> com outro.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />, a negative value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> for menor do que <paramref name="t2" />, um valor negativo que representa a diferença.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />, zero.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> for igual a <paramref name="t2" />, zero.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />, a positive value that represents the difference.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> for maior do que <paramref name="t2" />, um valor positivo que representa a diferença.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> instances with a property value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> are a special case with the following return values.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration> instâncias com um valor de propriedade de <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> são um caso especial com os seguintes valores de retorno.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is not, -1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` é automático e `t2` é não, -1 será retornado.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is Automatic and `t2` is also Automatic, 0 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` é automático e `t2` também é automática, será retornado 0.

trans-unit.source: If `t1` is not Automatic and `t2` is Automatic, 1 is returned.
trans-unit.target: Se `t1` não é automática e `t2` é automático, 1 é retornado.

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Indica se um objeto especificado é igual a uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Object to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: Objeto a ser verificado quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified object is equal to an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um objeto especificado é igual a uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if value is equal to the current instance of Duration; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o valor for igual à instância atual de Duração; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to check for equality.
trans-unit.target: Instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser verificada quanto à igualdade.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is equal to this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Determina se um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> especificado é igual a esta instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="duration" /> is equal to the current instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="duration" /> for igual à instância atual de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: First instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="t1" /> is equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <paramref name="t1" /> for igual a <paramref name="t2" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> value that represents an infinite interval.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que representa um intervalo infinito.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> initialized to a forever value.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> inicializado para um valor contínuo.

trans-unit.source: XAML Attribute Usage
trans-unit.target: Uso do Atributo XAML

trans-unit.source: XAML Values
trans-unit.target: Valores XAML

trans-unit.source: *property*
trans-unit.target: *propriedade*

trans-unit.source: A property that accepts a <xref:System.Windows.Duration> value.
trans-unit.target: Uma propriedade que aceita um <xref:System.Windows.Duration> valor.

trans-unit.source: Gets a hash code for this instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um código hash para essa instância.

trans-unit.source: A signed 32-bit integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: Um código hash do inteiro com sinal de 32 bits.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates if this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> representa um valor <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

trans-unit.source: True if this Duration is a <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: True se esta duração é um <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> valor; caso contrário, false.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Adds two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> together.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona duas instâncias do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> juntas.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> values, this method returns the sum of those two values.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> têm valores <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />, esse método retorna a soma desses dois valores.

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.
trans-unit.target: Se algum um desses valores for definido como <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />, o método retornará <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic" />.

trans-unit.source: If either value is set to <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />, the method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: Se algum um desses valores for definido como <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />, o método retornará <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.

trans-unit.source: If either <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> has no value, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Se um dentre <paramref name="t1" /> ou <paramref name="t2" /> não tiver nenhum valor, esse método retornará <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Add%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values and are equal, or if both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> tiverem valores e forem iguais ou se ambas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> são <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this method returns <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Do contrário, esse método retorna <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Equals%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines if one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than another.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> é maior que outra.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos <paramref name="t1" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> tiverem valores e <paramref name="t1" /> for maior que <paramref name="t2" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> é considerado maior do que qualquer valor finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer comparação com um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valor retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is greater than or equal to another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> é maior ou igual a outra.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is greater than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos <paramref name="t1" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> tiverem valores e <paramref name="t1" /> for maior ou igual a <paramref name="t2" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> é considerado maior do que qualquer valor finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer comparação com um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valor retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> from which an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is implicitly created.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> do qual uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> é criado implicitamente.

trans-unit.source: Implicitly creates a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from a given <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: Cria implicitamente um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> de determinado <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" />.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.%23ctor%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> is negative.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> é negativo.

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines if two instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> are not equal.
trans-unit.target: Determina se duas instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> não são iguais.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if exactly one of <paramref name="t1" /> or <paramref name="t2" /> represent a value, or if they both represent values that are not equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se exatamente um dos <paramref name="t1" /> ou <paramref name="t2" /> representar um valor ou se ambos representam valores diferentes; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor de uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> é menor que o valor de outra.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos <paramref name="t1" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> tiverem valores e <paramref name="t1" /> for menor que <paramref name="t2" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> é considerado maior do que qualquer valor finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer comparação com um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valor retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: The second instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: A segunda instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser comparada.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is less than or equal to the value of another instance.
trans-unit.target: Determina se o valor de uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> é menor ou igual ao valor de outra.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if both <paramref name="t1" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> have values and <paramref name="t1" /> is less than or equal to <paramref name="t2" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se ambos <paramref name="t1" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> tiverem valores e <paramref name="t1" /> for menor ou igual a <paramref name="t2" />; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> is considered greater than any finite value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> é considerado maior do que qualquer valor finito.

trans-unit.source: Any comparison with an <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> value returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Qualquer comparação com um <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> valor retorna `false`.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Compare%28System.Windows.Duration%2CSystem.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: A primeira instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser subtraída.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of one instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from another.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai o valor de uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> de outro.

trans-unit.source: If both instances of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> have values, an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> that represents the value of <paramref name="t1" /> minus <paramref name="t2" />.
trans-unit.target: Se ambas as instâncias de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> tiverem valores, uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> que representa o valor de <paramref name="t1" /> menos <paramref name="t2" />.

trans-unit.source: If <paramref name="t1" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" /> and <paramref name="t2" /> has a value of <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />, this method returns <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.
trans-unit.target: Se <paramref name="t1" /> tiver um valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" /> e <paramref name="t2" /> tiver um valor de <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan" />, esse método retornará <see cref="P:System.Windows.Duration.Forever" />.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, esse método retorna <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The following calculations all return a value of <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Os seguintes cálculos todos os retornam um valor de <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Forever%2A>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> minus <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Automatic%2A> menos <xref:System.Windows.Duration.TimeSpan%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Subtract%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a instância especificada do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: O método equivalente para esse operador é <xref:System.Windows.Duration.Plus%28System.Windows.Duration%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to get.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser obtido.

trans-unit.source: Returns the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Retorna a instância especificada do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: An instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.

trans-unit.source: The instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to subtract from the current instance.
trans-unit.target: A instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> a ser subtraída da instância atual.

trans-unit.source: Subtracts the value of the specified instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> from this instance.
trans-unit.target: Subtrai o valor da instância especificada de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> dessa instância.

trans-unit.source: A new instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> whose value is the result of this instance minus the value of <paramref name="duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma nova instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> cujo valor é o resultado dessa instância menos o valor de <paramref name="duration" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o valor <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> representa.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> value that this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: O valor <see cref="T:System.TimeSpan" /> que esse <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> representa.

trans-unit.source: Occurs if <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Ocorrerá se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> for <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts an instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> to a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation.
trans-unit.target: Converte uma instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" /> em uma representação <see cref="T:System.String" />.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of this instance of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
trans-unit.target: Uma representação <see cref="T:System.String" /> dessa instância de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Duration" />.
